resources.string: Step 1: Tap APUS Turbo Cleaner to continue

We need accessibility permission to :
1.Stop unnecessary apps thoroughly(Memory Boost). 
2.Clear system cache on Android6.0+(Junk Files). 
3.Extend battery life on Android6.0+ by put apps into "standby" mode(Battery Saver). 
No data provided by accessibility services will be stored or uploaded.
